thread.title: China Factory Activity Slows Slightly in April

title: China Factory Activity Slows Slightly in April
text:
Home / Business / China Factory Activity Slows Slightly in April China Factory Activity Slows Slightly in April 1 min ago Business
BEIJING—China’s manufacturing facility exercise slowed a tick in April as a consequence of weakening demand that economists stated is clouding the financial outlook together with commerce tensions with the U.S.
The official manufacturing buying managers index inched all the way down to 51.four in April from 51.5 in March, with new orders from home and overseas corporations rising at a slower tempo, the National Bureau of Statistics stated Monday. April’s studying got here in barely under economists’ forecasts.
…
